Hi all,

I have a simple assertion in my tescase (value is a String):

assertEquals("1",value);	
		
The assertion fails and I get the message

...junit.framework.ComparisonFailure: expected:<...> but was:<00...>
...

Is there a way to tell junit to diplay the values unchanged? 


Thanks,
